title: Vaccines—Autism Toolkit
description: Scientific studies show that many different genes work together with things in the environment to put a child at risk for autism spectrum disorder (ASD). Scientific studies do not show that vaccines cause ASD.
cleaned_text: Messages are not answered via the website urgently. Do not send a message regarding questions about a sick child. If your child is sick call the office so we can assist you immediately. 801-563-1975. 8822 S. Redwood Road
